ValidationRule.description: The Due Date field must be populated, in order to check the Follow Up Needed field, for Service Support HRE/CHB Ref Object record type ONLY.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (Follow_Up_Needed__c = TRUE), (ISNULL(Due_Date__c) ), (RecordType.Name = "Service Support HRE/CHB Ref Object"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a Due Date when checking the Follow Up Needed field.
